abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.rule:
In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next turn, its Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret weapon.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.*

abilities.name: Suppression Volley
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy **INFANTRY** unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

wargear_options: ■ Any number of Fire Warrior models can each have their pulse rifle replaced with 1 pulse carbine.

■ The Fire Warrior Shas’ui can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates:
◦ 1 guardian drone (it cannot take duplicates of this piece of wargear)
◦ 1 gun drone
◦ 1 marker drone
◦ 1 shield drone
unit_composition:
■ **1 Fire Warrior Shas’ui**
■ **9 Fire Warriors**

**Every model is equipped with:** pulse pistol; pulse rifle; close combat weapon.
